short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, Share and Access Content Effortlessly Anywhere, Anytime!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flexisaves is a Chrome extension designed to help you effortlessly save, manage, and share web content. Select and save content from any website with options for temporary or permanent storage, and organize your saved items into categories or custom collections. With Flexisaves, you can also create personalized notes for any webpage, making it easy to capture thoughts or clarify ideas in your own words. Share content, collections, and notes with others for seamless collaboration. Plus, update, delete, copy, or open the source page of any saved contentâ€”making it a versatile tool for organizing and accessing your web resources
